questions.question: How does data quality affect the reliability of AI-driven decisions?

choices.value: A combination of low-quality and high-quality data can enhance the accuracy and dependability of AI-driven decisions.
Low-quality data decreases the likelihood of model overfitting, enhancing the reliability of predictions.
High-quality data enhances the dependability and credibility of AI decisions, building trust among others.

questions.question: Why is the use of good data crucial for effective AI development?

choices.value: Guarantees a shorter model training duration.
Results in more precise and dependable predictions and outcomes.
Diminishes the necessity for post-launch implementation monitoring.

questions.question: A sales manager aims to improve the quality of lead data in their CRM system. What is the most likely process to assist the team in achieving this objective?

choices.value: Review and update missing lead information.

questions.question: A Cloudy Computing administrator wishes to capture a customer's preferred name on their record. Which Salesforce field type is most suitable for this purpose?

answers.explanation: High-quality data ensures that AI-driven decisions are reliable, building trust in AI systems.
Good data leads to precise and reliable AI predictions, enhancing decision-making accuracy.
Reviewing and updating missing lead information improves data quality and CRM efficiency.
A Text field is the most suitable choice for capturing a customer's preferred name in Salesforce.
